TH:Strongbox.NAME: Strongbox
TH:Strongbox.FLAVOR: Keeps your treasures safe and sound.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] whenever you play a treasure.

TH:HealthInsurance.NAME: Health Insurance
DESCRIPTIONS: When you start your turn bloodied, heal 1 HP and lose 1 gold per treasure.

TH:Anvil.NAME: Anvil
TH:Anvil.FLAVOR: Makes your precious things even more precious.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a treasure card to your deck, it is upgraded.

TH:Rum.NAME: Rum
TH:Rum.FLAVOR: Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a treasure, heal 1 HP and reduce weak, frail and vulnerable by 1.

TH:Parrot.NAME: Parrot
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a treasure, draw a card.

TH:GoldenGun.NAME: Golden Gun
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a treasure, deal
